properties.name: text
properties.value:
LADY CURZON, VICERINE OF INDIA, WAS INSTRUMENTAL IN 
PROMOTING THE USE OF INDIAN EMBROIDERY IN 
WESTERN FASHION. 
HER PEACOCK GOWN, STITCHED OF GOLD CLOTH AND
EMBROIDERED IN ZARDOZI WAS TREMENDOUS
SENSATION AT HER CORONATION CEREMONY!
